vsParam:
Oh right, what jobs do witches and wizards
in this world do?

Well... There are many jobs, ranging from accepting commissions
to kill monsters to studying magic in the Palace...

Wow, really!?
That's the life of a witch I always dream of!
What do witches and wizards do your world?

Yes, I-I am!
But like I said, we have to hide our identities.

That leaves us little chance to do things you mentioned...
After all, we have to live under the radar.

So even if we go out to hone our magic skills,
we can only use magic furtively.

Furtively...
Sounds like you must be under lots of stress all the time...

Exactly! So, I want to take
jobs done by witches here!

Let me think... Maybe, we can check out
the bulletin board to see if there's any job?

Er... This one is good.
Let's take this commission!

Killing monsters, huh?
Hee hee, I can't wait!

Hehe, look how excited you are. But you must be careful.
This place is not like your world. Don't be reckless, OK?

Don't worry!
Just leave it to me!

Y-you can nail it, can't you?
Anyway, we'll be with you, right, [px]?

Alright, reveal yourself!
Let me be your rival!

W-wait, Wilbell!?
Stay calm, and slow down!

Hehe, she's so excited to use magic in plain sight.
After all, she's only a child...

Hey! Who did you just call a child!
Hurry up!

Wow, impressive!
The monster is charred!

Hmm, see? Miss Wilbell's spectacular show!
Yeah~~! That's what I've been waiting for!

I'll become a great witch in no time
if I complete more commissions like today!

That's right! As long as you handle commissions
conscientiously, your strength will definitely grow.
Hey, hey! The witch squad over there!

Huh? What's the matter?
Why are you in a hurry...

Wilbell's magic j-just now
burned... everything...
Will... it become a forest fire!?
Gee! The fire spreads out fast!

D-did I try too hard just now?
Ahhhh... Aargh!

I-if the fire continues,
we'll be burnt!

Aargh! Wilbell!
Ple-please put it out!
I'm sorry! I can't do it by myself!

In this... case, all... all of us must put out the fire together!
Everyone must get back alive. Do you understand!?

Aargh... Cresson, don't be so dramatic!
A-anyway, let's put it out... together!
